Summary Note:
The Relationship Manager (RM) first met Romane Maes at a charity gala in Brussels. They had a long conversation about their mutual interest in philanthropy and decided to stay in touch.
Romane Maes is a seasoned professional with over 40 years of experience.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, she joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
Family Background: Romane Maes is currently widowed. Her children are named Van den Berghe and Alexandra.
Education Background:
In 1978, Romane graduated from Collège Notre-Dame de la Consolation with a secondary school diploma.
Romane graduated from University of Liège in 1984, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Romane Maes is a 64 year old retired Law Firm Chairman from Belgium. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Romane Maes launched her career as a Associate Attorney at Linklaters LLP, where she gained valuable experience from 1985 to 1990.
She then transitioned to Linklaters LLP as a Senior Associate, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1990 to 1991.
At Clifford Chance LLP, she worked as a Partner from 1991 to 1995, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
After 10 years of dedication, she assumed the role of Managing Partner at Allen & Overy LLP in 1997, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
She held the position of Law Firm Chairman at Linklaters LLP from 2001 until her retirement.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout her career, she saved 1650000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow her wealth.
Client does not have any properties.She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in her ability to achieve financial success and security.
